name: Cube Jump (Estek25)
description:
The main goal of the game is to gather all coins and buy all items in shop (4 items). To get coins you have to jump onto each platform which will randomly change colour by time. If you won't change colour of your cube to the one on platforms, the game will end. After collecting all items form shop, you will win the game.

Music from game:

Music: Eric Skiff - Song Name - Underclocked - Available at http://EricSkiff.com/music

Music: Eric Skiff - Song Name - A Night Of Dizzy Spells - Available at http://EricSkiff.com/music
